title: Tomorrow is another day
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Atomic bomb

description: The race for global and spacial dominance asserts itself in the form of armaments and their destructive capabilities. This animated film's symbolic message poses a frightening problem:  Is there hope for peaceful atomic applications or are nations so obsessed with destruction as a token of aggrandisement that the call for peace is merely a mushroom-cloud transparency?
